jcr:content.jcr:title: Narragansett Bay National Estuarine Research Reserve

contentheadline.headline: Narragansett Bay National Estuarine Research Reserve

contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox protected area | name = Narragansett Bay National Estuarine Research Reserve | alt_name = | iucn_category = | photo = | photo_alt = | photo_caption = | photo_width = | map = Wpdms ner naragan dm.jpg | map_alt = | map_caption = Narragansett Bay National Estuarine Research Reserve (map courtesy NOAA) | map_width = | location = [[Narragansett Bay]], [[Rhode Island]], [[USA]] | nearest_city = | lat_d = 41 | lat_m = 36 | lat_s = 7.54 | lat_NS = N | long_d = 71 | long_m = 22 | long_s = 3.73 | long_EW = W | coords_ref = | region = US-RI | area = {{Convert|2353|acre}} land<br />{{Convert|1591|acre}} water | established = 1980 | visitation_num = | visitation_year = | governing_body = | world_heritage_site = | url = }} The '''Narragansett Bay National Estuarine Research Reserve''' is a [[Marine Protected Area of the United States]] located on [[Prudence Island|Prudence]], [[Patience Island|Patience]], and [[Hope Island (Rhode Island)|Hope]] islands in [[Narragansett Bay]] in the state of [[Rhode Island]]. It was established in August 1980 under the [[Coastal Zone Management Act]]. The reserve encompasses 2,353 acres (9.5 km²) of land as well as 1,591 acres (6.4 km²) of water adjoining the islands out to a depth of {{Convert|18|ft}}. During the colonial era, all three islands were used for farming. By the 20th century, farming had declined and Prudence Island began to attract summer residents. During [[World War II]], the U.S. military established a presence on the island and remained until 1972, when the land was turned over to the state of Rhode Island. It encompasses coastal, estuarine, and tidal habitats. The reserve is managed by the [[Rhode Island Department of Environmental Management]] as a federal/state partnership in cooperation with [[NOAA]]. ==See also== *[[National Estuarine Research Reserve]] ==External links== *[http://www.nbnerr.org Narragansett Bay Research Reserve] *[http://www.nerrs.noaa.gov National Estuarine Research Reserve System] *[http://www2.mpa.gov/Action.lasso?-database=MPA_Inventory&-layout=ForWeb&-response=%2fmpa%2fmpaservices%2fquery%2fsiteprofile.lasso&-recordID=33912&-search MPA information site] *[http://www2.mpa.gov/Action.lasso?-database=MPA_Inventory&-layout=Section1&-response=%2fmpa%2fmpaservices%2fquery%2fsiteprofile1.lasso&-recordID=33912&-search Reserve Profile] {{Protected Areas of Rhode Island}} [[Category:Protected areas of Rhode Island]] [[Category:National Estuarine Research Reserves of the United States]] [[Category:Protected areas of Newport County, Rhode Island]] [[Category:Nature centers in Rhode Island]] {{RhodeIsland-geo-stub}}
